00023 #ifndef _GR_AGC_H_
00024 #define _GR_AGC_H_
00025 
00026 #include <math.h>
00027 
00034 class gr_agc {
00035 
00036  public:
00037   gr_agc (float rate = 1e-4, float reference = 1.0, float gain = 1.0)
00038     : _rate(rate), _reference(reference), _gain(gain) {};
00039 
00040   float rate () const      { return _rate; }
00041   float reference () const { return _reference; }
00042   float gain () const      { return _gain;  }
00043 
00044   void set_rate (float rate) { _rate = rate; }
00045   void set_reference (float reference) { _reference = reference; }
00046   void set_gain (float gain) { _gain = gain; }
00047 
00048   float scale (float input){
00049     float output = input * _gain;
00050     _gain += (_reference - fabsf (output)) * _rate;
00051     return output;
00052   }
00053 
00054   void scaleN (float output[], const float input[], unsigned n){
00055     for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; i++)
00056       output[i] = scale (input[i]);
00057   }
00058   
00059  protected:
00060   float _rate;                  // adjustment rate
00061   float _reference;             // reference value
00062   float _gain;                  // current gain
00063 };
00064 
00065 #endif /* _GR_AGC_H_ */
